summary: A conversion of the Seraphine Armor by jmenaru / BloodFree for UNPB-BBP with working weight slider. It requires jmenaru\'s original mod.
descriptionHtml:
A conversion of the Seraphine Armor by jmenaru / BloodFree for UNPB-BBP with working weight slider. It requires jmenaru\'s original mod.

[youtube]nyvQPbzzVEI[/youtube]
Thanks to MrKrossFaith for this video

This is my fourth modification. Any advice will be wellcomed.

English is not my native language so sorry for my mistakes.

Required mods (don\'t forget to endorse them):
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24723]Seraphine Armor - CBBEv3 - UNP[/url] (either CBBE or UNP version)
The UNPB body replacer with BBP support: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37900/]UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url] OR [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/]Troublemakers Clothing[/url]

Does not work without BBP.

Installation:
First install the required mods
Use NMM and overwrite when asked. Say no to upgrade.
Manual installation: open archive, extract meshes folder into data folder and overwrite when asked.

Credits and thanks:
jmenaru / BloodFree for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24723]Seraphine Armor - CBBEv3 - UNP[/url]
dimon99 and calyps and xp32 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - Now with Jiggle BBP[/url]
dimon99 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]
author: belisariu
